name: Bold Design System
description:
Welcome to bold, bridge’s open source design system.


Bold components were built following the specifications of WCAG AA level, so you can build inclusive digital products to enhance user experience.


Also, this is an open source project, so feel free to contribute, open issues if you find any bugs or implement new features. Find more information on GitHub.


But... we can't give you edit access, because:

At Bridge, we use Figma's professional plan, and we have limited editor seats that are exclusive to our designers and product owners.

If you want to contribute or edit for your project, we suggest that you dupplicate this file and/or open an issue at our Github page.


By default, Bold exports light and dark themes, but you can create a custom theme and use any primary palette that fits your project!


https://bold.bridge.ufsc.br/en/
